alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Sampson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 7:41PM EDT until August 07 at 8:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sampson County in central North Carolina... Eastern Cumberland County in central North Carolina... * Until 845 PM EDT. * At 741 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Dunn to 9 miles north of Jerome to Elrod, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. A gust to 60 MPH was observed at the Fayetteville airport at 735 PM EDT. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clinton, Harrells, Godwin, Jerome, Eastover, Roseboro, Stedman, Garland, Newton Grove and Wade. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
